task.title: Deactivate and activate server
task.shortdesc: You can deactivate and activate your server using the context menu in the servers view.

context.p: You can deactivate servers that you do not currently use on the Servers view in order to reduce memory consumption and network traffic used by the tool. To deactivate your server:

step.cmd: In the Servers view, Right-click your server and select Deactivate server.
The status bar will indicate that the application is Deactivating server. The state of the server is Inactive.

ol.li: In the Servers view, Right-click your server and select Activate server.
